name: Songs of Autumn
description:
To Start the Game Make a Combo of the three different notes, so click 1, 2, and 3 you should see a circle, a triangle and square appear.

You are a Leaflie a new born forest spirit ready to make the forest go through the fall. Help your siblings and forest creatures with their problems.

Use your songs to interact with the world and it's residence by creating different song combos.

Controls: 

  • [1] - Sings the Circle Note
  • [2] - Sings the Triangle Note 
  • [3] - Sings the Square Note 
  • [WASD/Arrow Keys] - Movement
  • [ESC] - Bring up Songs of Autumn
